de.rwth.i2.attestor.stateSpaceGeneration

Interface ProgramState

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, LabelledProgramState
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    JimpleExecutable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultState, GeneralProgramState, IndexedState

    public interface ProgramState
extends Cloneable, LabelledProgramState
    An abstraction of a single state in a StateSpace. This comprises information about the current program location, that is the value of the program counter, of the state and the program's heap.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ProgramState clone() 
      HeapConfiguration getHeap() 
      int getProgramCounter() 
      String getVariableNameInHeap(String originalVariableName)
      Converts the given variable name as it occurs in a program, such as "x", into a variable name that occurs in the heap configuration corresponding to this program state.
      ProgramState prepareHeap()
      Adds all required constants if not yet present, converts variables from the semantics format to the format used inside the heap, etc.
      void setProgramCounter(int pc) 
      ProgramState shallowCopy()
      Creates a shallow copy of this program state in which the underlying heap configuration is the same as in the copied object.
      ProgramState shallowCopyUpdatePC(int newPC)
      Creates a shallow copy of this program state in which the underlying heap configuration is the same as in the copied object.
      ProgramState shallowCopyWithUpdateHeap(HeapConfiguration newHeap)
      Creates a shallow copy in which the underlying heap is set to newHeap without creating a copy first.
      int size() 

      • Methods inherited from interface de.rwth.i2.attestor.stateSpaceGeneration.LabelledProgramState

        addAP, getAPs, satisfiesAP

    • Method Detail

      • getProgramCounter

        int getProgramCounter()
        Returns:
        The program location of this state.

      • setProgramCounter

        void setProgramCounter(int pc)
        Parameters:
        pc - The program location assigned to this state.

      • prepareHeap

        ProgramState prepareHeap()
        Adds all required constants if not yet present, converts variables from the semantics format to the format used inside the heap, etc.
        Returns:
        The program state with the required constants.

      • getVariableNameInHeap

        String getVariableNameInHeap(String originalVariableName)
        Converts the given variable name as it occurs in a program, such as "x", into a variable name that occurs in the heap configuration corresponding to this program state. In particular, this includes scope information, such as "0-x".
        Parameters:
        originalVariableName - The variable name as it occurs in the semantics.
        Returns:
        The corresponding variable name as stored in the heap configuration.

      • getHeap

        HeapConfiguration getHeap()
        Returns:
        The heap configuration determining the heap and the evaluation of variables for this program state.

      • size

        int size()
        Returns:
        The size of the heap configuration corresponding to this program state.

      • clone

        ProgramState clone()
        Returns:
        A deep copy of this program state.

      • shallowCopy

        ProgramState shallowCopy()
        Creates a shallow copy of this program state in which the underlying heap configuration is the same as in the copied object.
        Returns:
        A shallow copy of this program state.

      • shallowCopyWithUpdateHeap

        ProgramState shallowCopyWithUpdateHeap(HeapConfiguration newHeap)
        Creates a shallow copy in which the underlying heap is set to newHeap without creating a copy first.
        Parameters:
        newHeap - The heap underlying the copy.
        Returns:
        A shallow copy with a reference to newHeap as underlying heap.

      • shallowCopyUpdatePC

        ProgramState shallowCopyUpdatePC(int newPC)
        Creates a shallow copy of this program state in which the underlying heap configuration is the same as in the copied object. The program counter of the copy is set to the provided new program counter value.
        Parameters:
        newPC - The value of the program counter of the copy.
        Returns:
        A shallow copy of this program state with the given program counter.
